welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Havant, a charming town known for its beautiful countryside, historic buildings, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and experience all that our town has to offer and make unforgettable memories during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Goodwood Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Goodwood Airport caters to VIP and private charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bembridge Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Bembridge Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Southampton Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: East Terminal
terminals.description: The East Terminal at Southampton Airport is primarily used for charter and seasonal flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi for up to 4 hours by providing their email address.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lasham Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lasham Airport, handling all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at RAF Station Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including shops, restaurants, and lounges.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at RAF Station Airport is equipped to handle a wide range of freight and logistics needs.

wifi.note: WiFi is available for free throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Shoreham Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Shoreham Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.
